column4: i'm running ubuntu 904. i wanted to know how to add the shut off/restart back to the system menu like it was in previous ubuntu releases. any ideas ?
You can right click the menu and select Edit menus
Then find the System option to your left, and select New Item.
yup i'm in the system menu editor.. selected add new item. any idea what the commands are for shutdown, sleep etc ?
thanks buddy.. i'll check that out
